short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Light extension helper for yup social platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It is an alternative open-source helper extension for the yup social media network.

Check all details at: https://github.com/andrei0x309/yup-live-chrome-extension

MainFeatures:

- Basic account info display
- Light and dark theme
- Optionally enable or disable the notification system
- Optionally enable an overlay for all websites for an easy rating on mobile browsers
- Opt-in auto refil your like actions
- Opt-in notification at login
- Opt-in notification setting for browser reward notification
- Opt-in notification setting for browser mention, comment or follow noticiations
- Opt-in right click rate
- Open notification in app if notification is one of the following type: follow, mention, comment
